title: New Item bug. Doesn't charges
body: The new AP item released in patch 5.5 doesn't charges. fix that bug

replies.body: Only problem I have encountered with it is it is hard to build on tt because you can't buy a needlessly large, so you need to buy an aether wisp and then save up 2250 gold instead of buying the needlessly and saving up 650 gold

Usually they don't do different build paths but rather make a different item with the same effect (Ie to Van Dams)
so i cant see the stacks and i dont see the ''lighting'' like statik shiv

It probably just doesn't show stacks then. For one thing the passive effect doesn't appear the same way as it does with Statikk Shiv, it's not so much a lightning effect but rather translucent purple orbs (at least in my experience). If you can, record a game where you use the item and see if it deals any damage and/or shows it's visual effect.

From what I've seen of it, Luden's Echo works fine. Maybe you were thinking the passive would look like Statikk Shiv's? Or it just doesn't show stacks?

EDIT: Recently I've seen Luden's Echo a bit more and, as far as I can tell, it's working perfectly fine. It charges as it should, activates as it should and the visual effect appears as I assume it should.
